subject: RE: Samba TP6?
body:
That's awesome - are there plans to add ADSIEDIT.MSC?

-----Original Message-----
From: simo [mailto:idra@samba.org] 
Sent: Friday, June 22, 2007 9:28 AM
To: Krishna Ganugapati
Cc: Andrew Bartlett; Matt Schwartz; tridge@samba.org;
samba-technical@lists.samba.org
Subject: RE: Samba TP6?

On Fri, 2007-06-22 at 12:24 -0400, Krishna Ganugapati wrote:
> Could you clarify what MMC means here? Does this mean ADUC and the
GPOE
> snapins? - that would be very cool.

Yes, it means that.

Simo.
